from fastapi import FastAPI, HTTPException
from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware
from pydantic import BaseModel
import re

app = FastAPI()

app.add_middleware(
    CORSMiddleware,
    allow_origins=["*"],
    allow_credentials=True,
    allow_methods=["*"],
    allow_headers=["*"],
)

class VideoRequest(BaseModel):
    url: str

class VideoResponse(BaseModel):
    title: str
    duration: str
    views: str
    summary: str
    keyPoints: list[str]

def extract_video_id(url: str) -> str:
    """Extract YouTube video ID from URL"""
    patterns = [
        r'(?:youtube\.com\/watch\?v=)([^&]+)',
        r'(?:youtu\.be\/)([^?]+)',
        r'(?:youtube\.com\/embed\/)([^?]+)'
    ]
    for pattern in patterns:
        match = re.search(pattern, url)
        if match:
            return match.group(1)
    return None

@app.post("/api/summarize", response_model=VideoResponse)
async def summarize_video(request: VideoRequest):
    video_id = extract_video_id(request.url)
    if not video_id:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=400, detail="Invalid YouTube URL")
    
    # TODO: Implement actual YouTube API integration
    # For demo, return mock data
    return VideoResponse(
        title="Sample Video Title",
        duration="10:45",
        views="1.2M",
        summary="This video discusses important concepts about web development, including modern frameworks, best practices, and deployment strategies.",
        keyPoints=[
            "Introduction to modern web frameworks",
            "Best practices for scalable applications",
            "Deployment strategies and CI/CD",
            "Performance optimization techniques"
        ]
    )

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import uvicorn
    uvicorn.run(app, host="0.0.0.0", port=8000)

## Environment Variables

Backend (.env):
```
YOUTUBE_API_KEY=your_api_key
SUPABASE_URL=your_url
SUPABASE_KEY=your_key
```

Frontend (.env):
```
VITE_API_URL=https://your-backend.onrender.com
```

## Deploy Steps

1. Get YouTube API key from Google Cloud Console
2. Setup Supabase database with provided schema
3. Deploy backend to Render
4. Deploy frontend to Netlify
5. Configure CORS and environment variables
